name: Shri Rajesh Sharma
bio: Shri Rajesh Sharma serves as the Chief Minister of Himachal Pradesh, with a focus on development and governance.

name: Smt. Anjali Devi
bio: Smt. Anjali Devi works alongside the Chief Minister in shaping policies and handling administrative tasks.

name: Dr. Neelam Kaur
bio: Dr. Neelam Kaur is responsible for assisting in policy formulation and overseeing governmental departments.

name: Mr. Ramesh Verma
bio: Mr. Ramesh Verma assists the Chief Minister with daily scheduling, communications, and official tasks.

name: Smt. Pooja Mehta
bio: Smt. Pooja Mehta handles all media relations and public communications for the Chief Minister's office.

name: Shri Vikram Singh
bio: Shri Vikram Singh oversees the administrative operations and coordination within the Chief Minister's office.
